PageTitle: load-balancing eibgp(BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view)
FuncDef: By default, load balancing can be performed only among IBGP or EBGP routes, and the IGP metrics of the routes to be used for load balancing are compared. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Allows both EBGP and IBGP peers to support load balancing.
-
